mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.sender_id AS 'senderId', a.receiver_id AS 'receiverId', a.message, a.created, b.username AS 'senderName', c.username AS 'receiverName' FROM yb_record AS a
LEFT JOIN yb_user AS b ON a.sender_id = b.id LEFT JOIN yb_user AS c ON a.receiver_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yb_record ( sender_id, receiver_id, message, created ) values ( #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{message}, #{created} )
